caption:
💥 Small case, BIG win! 💥

We just secured a $15,000 settlement for a client who slipped and fell — and she only had $3,000 in medical bills.

📣 We LOVE cases like this.

Sure, we’ve taken on huge injury cases (like our $5.25 MILLION rear-end settlement)…
But we truly love helping with the smaller ones just as much. 🙌

💙 This is why we do what we do:
To stand up for real people — whether it’s against a big company or the City of L.A. itself.

➡️ If you’ve been injured, big or small — DM us. We’ll fight for you.
